articles.description: Illinois health officials reported 2598 new COVID-19 cases and 32 deaths Friday. Walgreens will begin vaccinating those eligible against the disease Friday.
articles.content: CHICAGO (WLS) -- Select Walgreens across the state will begin vaccinating those eligible against COVID-19 Friday as the Illinois Department of Public Health (IDPH) reported 2,598 new confirmed and pr… [+4075 chars]
